text: (visvasavantayini!) oba kumak kerehi visvasaya tæbuvehuda, e akarayatama ovunda visvasa kalahot niyata vasayenma ovun rju margaya at kara gannehuya. ovun pratiksepa kara hæriyahot niyata vasayenma (puhu) murandukamehima sitinnaha. ovun gæna obata (kisi biyak avasya næta!) allah pramanavatya. tavada ohu (ovunge kumantranakari vadan) savan denneku ha (ovunge vamcanikabhavaya) hondin danneku vasayenda sitinneya
